#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,sum1,sum,i;
	string a;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sum=0;
		sum1=0;
		cin>>a;
		for(i=0;i<a.length();i++)
		{
			if(i!=a.length()-1)
			{
			if(a[i]>='0'&&a[i]<='9')
			{
				sum=sum*10+a[i]-'0';
			}
		if(a[i]>='0'&&a[i]<='9');
		else
		{
			sum1+=sum;
		//	printf("sum=%d\n",sum);
			sum=0;
		}
	     }
	     else
	    if(i==a.length()-1)
		{
			if(a[i]>='0'&&a[i]<='9')
			{
				
		//	printf("sum=%d\n",sum);
			sum=sum*10+a[i]-'0';
		//	printf("sum=%d\n",sum);
			sum1+=sum;
		    }
		}
	    }
		printf("%d\n",sum1);
	}
}
